summary: AN ORDINANCE Relating to land use and zoning, amending Plat 22E, page 76 of the Official Land Use Map to rezone property located at 1700 North Northlake Way from Industrial Commercial with a 45-foot height limit (IC/45') to Commercial 1 with a 40-foot height limit (C1/40') and accepting a Property Use and Development Agreement in connection therewith. (Petition of Triad Northlake LLC, C.F. 303020, Appl. 9805357).
